reviewtext: Switching between Windows XP and RedHat Linux and it works well and is easy via a buttong on the unit or by double 'ctrl' clicks. I also use a 17" flat panet LCD monitor and the video quality is very good. The only thing I don't like about the unit is that the cables for the 2 pc's are on the sides of the unit. If it were a bit bigger and all the connectors on the rear... I would have rated 5 stars.
